Class FnalGroupDef

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Defines a functional group.

                                    throws ParameterException,
                                           DBException
        Acquires a functional group from the database.

        Throws:
        ParameterException - if the id doesn't match a functional group
        DBException - if there's a problem reading from the database

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Gets the name for display: first letter (not counting prefix) is lower-case.
        Returns:
        display name of the functional group

      • getPulldownName

        public String getPulldownName()
        Gets the name for display in pulldown menu: first letter (not counting prefix) is lower-case.
        Returns:
        name of the functional group modified for a pulldown

      • tweakName

        private String tweakName(int type)
        Modifies a functional group name for displaying in HTML or pulldown menu.
        Parameters:
        type - PULLDOWN or DISPLAY
        Returns:
        functional group name modified for display as HTML or in a pulldown menu

      • getSortKey

        public String getSortKey()
        Makes a string used to sort the groups obtained from the database:
        sortName [tab] groupId
        In sortname, leading locants are moved to the end of the name.
        Returns:
        key for sorting the functional group
